bibl.title: Lords of Hellas, Old Men of the Sea. The Occasion of Simonides' Elegy on Plataea.
The New Simonides. Contexts of Praise and Desire
bibl.author: SHAW, P.-J.

bibl.note: I.E.G. II2, Simonides, 10-18 (in part. 11). - The proem to the elegy contains an invocation to the son of the sea-nymph, almost certainly to be identified as Achilles.
SHAW P.-J., Lords of Hellas, Old Men of the Sea. The Occasion of Simonides' Elegy on Plataea.
Deborah BOEDEKER and David SIDER (Edd.), The New Simonides. Contexts of Praise and Desire (Oxford, 2001) pp. 164-181, 2 cartes.
